meanings.definition: A piece of hard candy attached to the end of a stick for sucking or licking.
meanings.sent1: I bought a colorful lollypop at the store.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed the sweet taste of the lollypop.
meanings.sent3: The lollypop made her smile with its bright colors.
meanings.sent4: The lollypop was a rainbow of flavors in her mouth.
meanings.sent5: The lollypop was a sugary delight on a hot day.

meanings.definition: To lick or suck on a lollypop.
meanings.sent1: He lollypopped on the candy happily.
meanings.sent2: She lollypops on lollypops all day long.
meanings.sent3: The way he lollypops on that lollypop is amusing.
meanings.sent4: She lollypops on challenges like a pro.
meanings.sent5: Lollypopping on a lollypop can be quite satisfying.
